thread.title: WATCH: Incredible Video Chronicling Conor McGregor's Rise To Stardom
thread.title_full: WATCH: Incredible Video Chronicling Conor McGregor's Rise To Stardom

title: WATCH: Incredible Video Chronicling Conor McGregor's Rise To Stardom
text:
WATCH: Incredible Video Chronicling Conor McGregor's Rise To Stardom Tue Jan 31 2017 22:19:27   22:19:27 GMT+0000 (GMT) Joe Baiamonte Joe Baiamonte in other 
From walking the streets of Dublin to becoming the King Of New York, Conor McGregor's rise to the pinnacle of the UFC has been meteoric and the Irishman is showing no sign of slowing down. 
McGregor's passion to become the best is paralleled by the passion of his fanbase, one of whom has taken the time to put together a tribute video to the UFC Lightweight Champion. 
The video, dubbed 'It Was All A Dream' chronicles 'The Notorious'' humble beginnings as a, dare we say, shy, clean shaven young cage fighter in Dublin to the biggest star in Mixed Martial Arts. 
The video is well on its way to a million views, clocking up 20,000 likes and over 13,000 shares at the time of writing and deservedly so. 
McGregor is currently taking time off from the octagon while his girlfriend, Dee Devlin, is pregnant with the couple's first child, which the Irishman recently confirmed is going to be a boy. 
It is expected that 'The Notorious' will defend his Lightweight title in over the Summer against the winner of the interim championship bout between Tony Ferguson and Khabib Nurmagomedov at UFC 209 in March. 
Will the Irishman write another successful chapter in his incredible story? Featured Image Credit: PA
